TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RadioButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase

summary.span: 当与其他 控件成对出现时，使用户能够从一组选项中选择一个选项。

span.span: Enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示文本和/或 。The control can display text, an , or both. 当用户在组内选择一个选项按钮（也称为单选按钮）时，其他选项按钮会自动清除。When the user selects one option button (also known as a radio button) within a group, the others clear automatically. 给定容器中的所有 控件，如 ，构成一个组。All controls in a given container, such as a , constitute a group. 若要在一个窗体上创建多个组，请将每个组放在其自己的容器中，如 或 控件。To create multiple groups on one form, place each group in its own container, such as a or control. 和 控件具有类似的函数：它们提供用户可以选择或清除的选项。 and controls have a similar function: they offer choices a user can select or clear. 不同之处在于，可以同时选择多个 控件，但选项按钮是互斥的。The difference is that multiple controls can be selected at the same time, but option buttons are mutually exclusive. 使用 属性可获取或设置 的状态。Use the property to get or set the state of a . 通过设置 "" 属性，可以更改选项按钮的外观，使其显示为切换样式按钮或标准选项按钮。The option button's appearance can be altered to appear as a toggle-style button or as a standard option button by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 中的两个 控件并对其进行初始化。The following code example creates and initializes two controls in a . 该示例使用 事件来跟踪选定的 ，并在用户单击 时报告所选 的文本。The example uses the event to track which is selected and reports the text of the selected when the user clicks a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form. 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用 `InitializeRadioButtons`。Call `InitializeRadioButtons` from the form's constructor or the event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认视图中，其文本与按钮右侧对齐，并且 属性设置为 "`true`"。The default view of the has its text aligned to the right of the button and the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化一个 ，为其提供切换按钮的外观，将其 属性设置为 `false`，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle button, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于确定 的外观。

span.span: Gets or sets a value determining the appearance of the .
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 值设置为 ，则将使用圆形复选框绘制 控件。If the value is set to , then the control is drawn with a circular check box. 如果将该值设置为 ，则将 绘制为可切换到向上或向下状态的控件。If the value is set to , then the is drawn as a control that can be toggled to an up or down state. 这两种类型均可显示文本和/或图像。Either type can display text, an image, or both. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化一个 ，为其提供切换控件的外观，并将其 属性设置为 `false`，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle control, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . [!code-csharp[Classic RadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButton Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButton Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `RadioButton1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RadioButton1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#535](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#535)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#535](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#535)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它指示：在单击控件时， 值和控件的外观是否自动更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value and the appearance of the control automatically change when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在发生 事件时自动更改 值和控件的外观，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value and the appearance of the control automatically change on the event; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 值设置为 `false`，则必须在 事件处理程序中的代码中检查控件 部分。If the value is set to `false`, the portion of the control must be checked in code in the event handler. 此外，如果 是 控件组的一部分，则此属性可确保在给定的时间仅选中其中一个控件。In addition, if the is part of a control group, this property ensures that only one of the controls is checked at a given time. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则一组 控件将不充当互斥组，必须在代码中更新 属性。If the property is set to `false`, a group of controls will not act as a mutually exclusive group and the property must be updated in code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化一个 ，为其提供切换控件的外观，并将其 属性设置为 `false`，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle control, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . [!code-csharp[Classic RadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButton Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButton Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在运行时更改 属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be changed at run time. 当 值更改时， 的复选框部分将移到文本的右侧或左侧。The check box portion of a is moved to the right or left of the text when the value changes. 此示例要求 控件已在窗体上进行了实例化，并且已包括对 命名空间的引用。This example requires that a control has been instantiated on a form and that a reference to the namespace has been included. [!code-cpp[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.
